subject: Order update
description_text:
Hi team,

I ordered some haptics on the 6th June - Order #SSN1657

There was information on your website at the time suggesting these would be sent on the 16th June. However I've yet to receive any update as to when I will receive them.

Can you please provide an update on when they will be delivered.

Thanks.

Cameron

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi，Cameron Steward，  Your order has been shipped. Here is the latest tracking information—please take a look.
